name: Dollar Collector
description:
Collect 25 dollars to win!

Arrow keys or WASD to move the player.

Each time you go over a dollar, you get one dollar.

Each time you go over taxes, you lose a dollar.

If you go into negatives, you automatically restart.

If you reach the end with not enough money, click "r" to restart.

Enjoy the game? Send me a follow. I would really appreciate it!
